data.eml:eml: Rotylenchus castilloi n. sp. (Nematoda: Hoplolaimidae), a new species with long stylet from northern Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Talezari, Atefeh, Pourjam, Ebrahim, Kheiri, Ahmad, Liébanas, Gracia, Aliramaji, Farzad, Pedram, Majid, Rezaee, Saeed, Atighi, Mohammad Reza (2015): Rotylenchus castilloi n. sp. (Nematoda: Hoplolaimidae), a new species with long stylet from northern Iran. Zootaxa 3931 (1): 88-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3931.1.6
